name: decide_if_we_should_use_this_resource
description: Decide if we should use this educational resource with a student.

factual.description: A 1-5 score representing how factual the resource is.

well_written.description: A 1-5 score representing how well written the resource is.

specific.description: A 1-5 score representing how specific the resource is.

enhances_understanding.description: A 1-5 score representing if the resource enhances understanding.

self_contained.description: A 1-5 score representing if the resource is self contained.

overall.description: A 1-5 overall score representing the educational value of the resource to a student.
